course_description: Patient safety will be emphasized including operating room safety, biomedical electrical safety, blood and fluid exposure, emergency preparedness, and safety reporting. Simulated experiences within an interprofessional team will be provided.
prerequisites: CVP 566 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 5256, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 12-12:50p, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
